entry.title: Protein Cheesecake
entry.content:
Satisfy your sweet tooth with our easy, no bake cheesecake recipe! All you need is ten minutes to prepare this protein packed cheesecake. Make this treat a staple in your weekly meals! 

Cook Time: 2-4 hours

Servigns: 8

INGREDIENTS:

  • { Crust }: 1 pack of mini graham cracker pie crusts
  • { Filling }: No bake filling
  • 16 oz of 1/3 less fat cream cheese
  • 3/4 cup of plain low fat greek yogurt
  • 3 tbsp of sugar
  • 3 tbsp of corn starch
  • 1 tsp vanilla
  • 2 scoops SEEQ protein 

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Add 3/4 cup of plain fat yogurt
  2. Add 16 oz of 1/3 less fat cream cheese to bowl
  3. Add 2 scoops of your SEEQ protein
  4. Add 3 tbsp sugar
  5. Add 3 tbsp of sugar
  6. Add 1 tsp vanilla extract
  7. Once all your ingredients are in mix thoroughly until you get a nice thick smooth consistency
  8. Lay out your mini graham cracker crusts and spoon your mixture in.
  9. Once all your pies are filled, place your tray in a fridge to chill for 2-4 hours until firm

 

TIPS & TRICKS:

  • If you aren’t the largest fan of sugar, substitute it for your favorite sugar alternative. Bring on the stevia, coconut sugar, or even maple syrup. 
  • To make this recipe gluten-free, make sure to purchase a gluten-free graham cracker crust from the store instead of the regular kind. There are no reasons not to enjoy this velvety and flavorful dessert. 
  • Don’t forget to garnish! Top your cheesecake off with some plump raspberries, softened mango, or even more pineapple chunks for a refreshing addition to your dessert.

entry.title: Protein Sorbet
entry.content:
Craving ice cream but not the calories? Looking for a refreshing and healthy treat to enjoy on a hot summer day? Look no further than this protein sorbet recipe! Made with fresh fruit and SEEQ Clear Whey Protein, this sorbet is packed with protein and full of flavor. Plus, it's easy to make and doesn't require any special equipment. You really can not go wrong with this frozen dessert. 

Cook Time: 10-15 minutes
Servings: 1
INGREDIENTS:
  • Fresh fruit of your choice
  • Lemon juice
  • 1-2 scoops SEEQ Clear Whey Protein
INSTRUCTIONS:
  1. Wash and prepare your fruit by removing any pits, stems, or seeds.
  2. Add your fruit and a splash of lemon juice to your blender and pulse for the first 30 seconds or until the fruit is crushed.
  3. Blend on high until you achieve a smooth consistency.
  4. Add in 1-2 scoops of SEEQ Protein and pulse until the powder is mixed in.
  5. Pour the mixture into a freezer-safe container or pan and freeze for 2-3 hours.
  6. When you are ready to serve, allow the sorbet to sit at room temperature for about 5-10 minutes to soften.
  7. Scoop the sorbet into bowls or cones and enjoy!
TIPS & TRICKS:
  • The most wonderful part about this recipe is just how versatile it is. There is no definitive fruit that you have to use with it (that would be boring anyways). So change your sorbet recipe to fit whatever mood you are in! Versatility is the best part of this sorbet recipe. So get creative and have fun with it. 
  • Try adding some sliced fruit on top of your sorbet for some added sweetness and to make an eye-catching Instagram photo.
